function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity of individuals in SMEs can lead to the rapid spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential public health crisis.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, promoting good hygiene practices, and providing access to healthcare services.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and remote working technologies.","People":"Employees, customers, and visitors to SMEs.","Owner":"SME owners, government health agencies, and public health experts."}]}
